title: Mix and match champion passives and abilities
body:
To make the most broken champion

Passive: {{champion:28}} Perma stealth and mana regen.
Q: {{champion:31}} the weakness of Cho'Gath's Q is that it's easy to dodge when you can expect it.
W: {{champion:80}} stun and gapcloser
E: {{champion:67}} even more stun/peel
R: {{champion:17}} the only weakness, high mana cost, is negated by passive

Can be built full ap assassin or a tank. Incredible roaming potential and dueling potential, as well as splitpushing potential.

replies.body:
Passive: {{champion:106}} Makes him hard to kill, while scaling well with health.
Q: {{champion:75}} Can build pure tank while still having excellent Infinitely scaling damage.
W: {{champion:14}} Is rewarded for playing full tank with more tankiness.
E:{{champion:154}} Mobility in spades.
R: {{champion:23}} Excellent last resort for if the going gets really tough.

This is a full tank. he is retarded strong. doesn't even need a damage item.
